basics.name: Jenade Moodley
basics.label: Cloud Engineer
basics.summary: Seasoned Cloud Engineer with experience in Cloud, System, and Software Engineering. Bachelor of Science Honours in Computer Science from university of Kwa-Zulu Natal. Skilled in Cloud Architecture, Linux System Engineering, Technical Support, Technical Training, and Containers. Based in Durban, South Africa

work.name: Amazon Web Services
work.summary: My role at AWS is to resolve diverse and in-depth customer support queries, focusing on large enterprise customers, including Fortune 500 companies, with complex environments and architecture. I also mentored, trained, and upskilled engineers within the organization, and focused on support engineering projects.
highlights: Pioneer for the AWS Premium Support Andon Program (PSAP) in Cape Town
Quality Champion - Evaluate the quality and appropriateness of Support correspondences of engineers
Member of ECS (Elastic Container Service) Support Operations
Leader of the ECS Pioneer initiative which trained AWS engineers globally on Docker, containerization, and ECS/Fargate
ECS Subject Matter Expert - Proved deep technical expertise on using and troubleshooting ECS, capable of answering in-depth queries and further develop the ECS service offered by AWS

work.name: University of Kwa-Zulu Natal
work.summary: At UKZN I assisted the Computer Science faculty by tutoring students, facilitating exams, and graded assignments and assessments
highlights: Assisted in teaching of tutorials and practicals

education.studyType: Bachelor of Science Honours (Summa Cum Laude)

certificates.name: Linux+
certificates.summary: CompTIA Linux+ validates the competencies required of an early career system administrator supporting Linux systems.

certificates.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certificates.summary: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate showcases knowledge and skills in AWS technology, across a wide range of AWS services. The focus of this certification is on the design of cost and performance optimized solutions, demonstrating a strong understanding of the AWS Well-Architected Framework. This certification can enhance the career profile and earnings of certified individuals and increase your credibility and confidence in stakeholder and customer interactions.

certificates.name: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate
certificates.summary: This credential helps organizations identify and develop talent with critical skills for implementing cloud initiatives. Earning AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate validates experience in deploying, managing, and operating workloads on AWS.

certificates.name: AWS Certified Developer – Associate
certificates.summary: AWS Certified Developer - Associate showcases knowledge and understanding of core AWS services, uses, and basic AWS architecture best practices, and proficiency in developing, deploying, and debugging cloud-based applications by using AWS. Preparing for and attaining this certification gives certified individuals more confidence and credibility. Organizations with AWS Certified developers have the assurance of having the right talent to give them a competitive advantage and ensure stakeholder and customer satisfaction.

certificates.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
certificates.summary: This credential helps certified individuals showcase advanced knowledge and skills in providing complex solutions to complex problems, optimizing security, cost, and performance, and automating manual processes. This certification is a means for organizations to identify and develop talent with these critical skills for implementing cloud initiatives.

certificates.name: Container Service (ECS) Subject Matter Expert
certificates.summary: The earner of this badge has gained deep technical expertise in the mentioned AWS service. The earner has a proven track record of improving customer experience by demonstrating the must-know technical depth of the service architecture. They are aware of the big picture understanding of the service competencies, known issues and workarounds. They exhibit the critical knowledge required to resolve complex cases, and apply their service knowledge to find technical solutions.

awards.title: Wise Guru Award
awards.summary: This award is for engineers who are pivotal in the team's mentoring and training efforts.

publications.name: Weather Characterization from Outdoor Scene Images
publications.publisher: International Conference on Computer Vision and Graphics
publications.summary: Research paper presenting a variety of techniques to characterize outdoor scene images into their respective weather components; the sky condition (sunny or cloudy), the presence of rain, and the visibility.
